title: 796. QB Pro Days, Ranking Offseason Moves & AFC South Body Shop
itunes:title: 796. QB Pro Days, Ranking Offseason Moves & AFC South Body Shop
description:
Daniel Jeremiah, Bucky Brooks and Rhett Lewis are back with a special new episode of Move the Sticks. The guys start by breaking down the Chiefs trading wide receiver Tyreek Hill to the Dolphins. Next, the trio hit on the pro days of 3 different college quarterbacks. After that, the guys take the Colts and Jaguars in the body shop to look at their team needs and to examine what they can do to improve this offseason. Following that, the trio rank the 8 biggest NFL offseason moves. Then, the guys look at the top 3 picks of DJ's mock draft 3.1. After, the trio put the Titans and Texans in the body shop.


Move the Sticks is a part of the NFL Podcasts Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
